Game.Name: The Battle of the Red Cliffs
Game.Plot: San Guo Yan Yi: Huo Shao Chi Bi (三國演義 火焼赤壁), also known as The Battle of Red Cliffs, is an unlicensed beat-'em-up game for the Sega Mega Drive released in some unknown year. The game is an unofficial port of the Sega Saturn title Tenchi wo Kurau II: Sekiheki no Tatakai.
